page.title: 16LEISURE PURSUITS,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: Here are the results of a survey on {leisure pursuits}done by 11 year olds and their parents.Some of the sports the{children}do out of school are swimming,karate,jogging,horse riding, gymnastics,football,running and ballet.The{hobbies}they do are model railwaying,going to St Johns,keeping fish,reading,playing the guitar and playing the piano.There are many {reasons}why the children do their sport or hobby.It keeps them fit,it lets them work with animals,it's good fun and"there's nothing else to do". The children's{mothers}have a variety of{pastimes}including walking, painting,bingo,cooking and darts. The children's{fathers}also do various {activities}including skittles, gardening,snooker and looking after fish.
